parts: Please generate a picture of a group of old people sleeping at a jazz concert in New York

content.text: {"size":"1024x1024","prompt":"A quaint jazz club in New York City with dim lighting and vintage decor. A group of elderly individuals are seated around a round table with a red velvet tablecloth. They are all dozing off, with a few heads resting on their hands and others slumped over the table. Some are wearing classic fedoras and glasses, and one has a cane resting against the table. In the background, a jazz band is performing on a small stage with a saxophonist, a double bass player, and a pianist. The atmosphere is cozy and the room is filled with soft jazz music and the faint sound of clinking glasses."}
